p: Further most promising natural products can pave a way for their synthetic manufacture which will pose less pressure on natural resources and will be economically feasible for their wide spread use as a pesticide. Thus, antimicrobial and insecticidal properties of essential oils of Mentha species offer the prospect of using them as natural pesticides and they can have market niches with a commercial value. Finally, a systematic and gradual approach for embracing natural products against several pests of agriculture without jeopardizing commercial, social interest is need of the day for a healthy sustainable environment in future.
